hr.fer.zemris.java.hw12.jvdraw.list

Interface DrawingModelListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DrawingObjectListModel, JDrawingCanvas

    public interface DrawingModelListener
    Interface for objects that listens to DrawingModel
    Author:
    Vilim Staroveški

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Notification fired when objects are added

    • Method Detail

      • objectsAdded

        void objectsAdded(DrawingModel source,
                  int index0,
                  int index1)
        Notification fired when objects are added
        Parameters:
        source - component on which objects are added
        index0 - index of first added object
        index1 - index of last added object
